701439f-a.title: Bronx: Mayflower Avenue - Middleton Road
701439f-a.text:
162O Mayflower Ave., adjoining the N.E. corner of Middletown Road,
showing the J. Ferris Mansion. It was built in about 1830. Between
1915 and 1917 the house was used as a summer home by the Cathedral Girls'
Club, and at this date (1938) it is the sexton's house of the Tremont Ter-
3race Moravian Church which faces on Pilgrim Ave., adjoining the N.W. cor-
ner of Middletown Road. The mansitn stands directly behind the church
proper.
About 1923.
Joseph P. Day.
701439f-a.folder: Mayflower Avenue & Middleton Road, Bronx, NY
